hero.title: Synapse
hero.description: Synapse is a modern, high-performance Discord bot designed with elegance and precision. It combines a premium music experience, advanced moderation, intelligent automation, and beautifully crafted interfaces — all built for reliability, scalability, and control.

featuresSection.title: Everything Your Server Deserves
featuresSection.description: Synapse brings balance, security, and intelligence to your community — quietly and efficiently.

features.title: Refined Music System
features.description: Crystal-clear, stable music playback with support for YouTube, Spotify, playlists, queues, and lyrics.

features.title: Elegant Interface
features.description: Premium embeds, canvas-based welcome banners, profile cards, and fully customizable visuals.

features.title: Advanced Security
features.description: Powerful Anti-Nuke protection, intelligent AutoMod, logging, and complete moderation control.

features.title: Smart Automation
features.description: Auto-roles, auto-responses, auto-reactions, verification systems, and voice automation.

features.title: Engagement & Utility
features.description: Interactive games, leveling, profiles, utilities, and community-focused features.

features.title: Modern Architecture
features.description: Built using the latest JavaScript ecosystem with MongoDB, optimized for speed, stability, and scale.
